amendment.description: An amendment to the Skelton amendment to exempt discretionary Medicare legislation in excess of $50,000,000, in addition to national defense programs, from the Presidential line item veto.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Green to the Skelton amendment (A008).

Mr. Goss raised a point of order against the Green amendment (A009). Mr. Goss stated that the amendment was not germane and, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
